attributes.action: Keep animal welfare standards the responsibility of the government not industry
attributes.additional_details: See The Guardian article "Government planning to repeal animal welfare codes" by Rowena Mason dated 26 March 2016.
attributes.background:
The government is planning to repeal official guidance on animal welfare standards, starting with a move to put the code on chicken-farming in the hands of the poultry industry. 
Industry is about profit, not animal welfare. Please sign this petition to keep regulators separate from those regulated

rejection.details: we think the following petition is similar to yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/125827
